comment:
Extracted Variables:
- \( x \): Number of glass bottles
- \( y \): Number of plastic bottles
- \( glass\_capacity \): Capacity of a glass bottle in ml (500 ml)
- \( plastic\_capacity \): Capacity of a plastic bottle in ml (750 ml)
- \( glass\_min \): Minimum number of glass bottles (20 bottles)
- \( glass\_to\_plastic\_ratio \): Ratio of plastic bottles to glass bottles (3 times)
- \( available\_water \): Available water in ml (250000 ml)

Constraints:
1. \( 500x + 750y \leq 250000 \) (Water constraint)
2. \( x \geq 20 \) (Glass minimum constraint)
3. \( y \geq 3x \) (Glass to plastic ratio constraint)

Objective:
- Maximize the total number of bottles: \( x + y \)
